results.name: Sum of divisors computed for conjugated prime factorization: a(n) = A000203(A122111(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4096
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: A122111[n_] := Product[Prime[Sum[If[j < i, 0, 1], {j, #}]], {i, Max[#]}]&[ Flatten[Table[Table[PrimePi[f[[1]]], {f[[2]]}], {f, FactorInteger[n]}]]];
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 10 2019
